how_rise.button: How do I submit an offer with an increased price?
how_rise.1: Request permission to increase the offer price in the chat with the Customer
how_rise.2: The customer will inform you about his decision in the chat
how_rise.3: If you receive permission, you will be able to submit an offer with an increased price once

helper_auction.label: How to submit a bid, which violate the rights of the price change?

description.label: You can request a one-time permission to submit an offer that violates the established price change rules. To do this:
description.1: Request permission from the Customer in the Request chat
description.2: The customer will inform you of his decision
description.3: Once approved, you will be able to submit a bid that violates the price change rule once.

helper_positions.label: How do I change the price for individual items?

description.label: Changing the price will proportionally change the price of the item offerings. If you are not happy with this, you have the option to adjust the prices individually. To do this:
description.2: Change the prices for items and update the offer
description.3: Remember that the updated price must comply with the price change rule

text.free-for-company: Participation in the request is free, without deposits and blocking of funds! Your company will not pay Service operator's Commission if you are declared the winner of the request.
text.free-for-request: Participation in the request is free, without deposits and blocking of funds! At the current request, the Service operator's Commission will not be charged if you are declared the winner of the request.
text.payment: Participation in the request is free, without deposits and blocking of funds! The Service operator's Commission is payable only by the winner of the request as determined by the client and is independent of the actual conclusion of the contract between the client and the winner and the signing of other legally binding documents based on the results of the request.

total.multi: The amount of the Service operator's Commission depends on the amount of the order and is as follows:
total.single: The amount of the Service operator's Commission doesn't depend on the amount of the order and is as follows:

block_many.message:
Blocked participants:
• cannot modify or submit a bid.
• cannot view the bids of other participants 

At any time, you can unblock participatns to let them submit bids again.

block_one.message:
Blocked participants:
• cannot modify or submit a bid.
• cannot view the bids of other participants 

You can cancel the blocking at the stage of accepting proposals of the current and next stages.

alternative_proposals.tooltip: Indicate how many alternative bids the participant can submit
alternative_proposals.error: Please enter a number between 0 and 10
alternative_proposals.count: Possible number of bids in addition to the main one: {{ value }}
alternative_proposals.none: Submission of alternative bids is prohibited.

expected_price.label: Expected price
expected_price.tooltip: Expected bid price level of the participant

errors.best_price_unavailable:
Value "best offer" is available if:
 • Bid quantity = Full satisfaction
 • What participants can view = Competitors' offers
 • Price change rule = Reduction or Auction
errors.step_over_start_price: The change step exceeds the maximum price
errors.best_price_positions_unavailable:
The value "according to the items of the best offer" is available if:
• Positions are indicated in the specification by positions
• What participants can view = Competitors' offers
• Price Change Rule = Reduction or Auction
• Percentage reduction set
errors.self_price_positions_unavailable:
The value "according to the items of your offer" is available if:
• Positions are indicated in the specification by positions
• Price Change Rule = Reduction or Auction
• Percentage reduction set

reference.2: according to the items of your offer
reference.3: according to the items of the best offer

currency.label: Bidding currency
currency.permissions_multicurrency: Allow suppliers to quote prices in other currencies
currency.description: The list of currencies can only be changed at the draft stage
currency.change_primary_currency: The base currency has been updated. Change the rates of additional currencies

allow_dialog.title: Remove permission
allow_dialog.text: This will remove the added currencies

tooltips.1: Request is available for viewing and participation only to invited suppliers
tooltips.editable: Opened - the participants are not limited. Closed - available for viewing and participation only to invited suppliers

owner_visibility.label: Requester at the bid acceptance window

prolongation.label: Auto extension of bids submission
prolongation.tooltip: This is applied when participants submit a bid before the close of the bid extension window. This window is open for up to 99 minutes.

approximate_deadline_for_summing_up.label: Final closing of bids submission
approximate_deadline_for_summing_up.description: days after the last accepted bid
approximate_deadline_for_summing_up.tooltip: Bidders will await a decision by the tender committee within the specified time period

popover.title: Request for verified vendors
popover.text: Suppliers with verified legal registration may submit proposals
popover.helper: The site specialists check the suppliers and mark them with a special icon

questionnaire_enabled.sub_title: Questionnaire with questions for the supplier. The resulting profiles are conveniently compared in Bidzaar.

settings.sub_title: We have customized the request in such a way that you can choose the most favorable bid.

Information is available only to company employees.
Log in or register your company for free on the site.

tags.empty_placeholder: Describe the subject of your request with keywords
tags.label: Tags
tags.label_tooltip: Describe your need with tags. By tags, suppliers will be able to find an open request or receive an invitation to it by subscription

ownerless.title: Team has no owner

exclude.title: Do you really want to exclude this member from the team?

role.title: Role changing
role.text: Viewer and Auditor have limited rights. Only the other owner of the request can set owner status.

fee.private: No fee is charged for your company's private requests
